department: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
short_summary: dry docking, ship repair, and maintenance services for the Canadian Coast Guard Ships (CCGS) Ile St-Ours and Caribou Isle
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of the Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) is issuing this bid solicitation for the acquisition of services including dry docking, appropriate preventative maintenance services and emergency repairs.
full_summary:
